title: Riot its my birthday soon!
body:
(This is meant as a joke, please take this with some salt. Should have plenty from those games today)

Here's what you can get me-

Either-
The next Shuriman based champions references the "Acolyte Of Shurima"
#TeamNasus

or

Create a champion in my likeness
(If I have too I will write you guys a bloody short novel)

replies.body:
Go team nasus

http://imgur.com/a/PFG3j

[And make a new friend(Believe)](http://forum.lol.garena.ph/showthread.php?60333-Champion-Concept-Rival-of-Xerath)
Doubt they are gonna do it tbh xD
And what date would your birthday be?
